q1.question: Is ImageCube free to use?
q1.answer: Yes, all features of ImageCube are completely free. All image processing is done locally in your browser without requiring account registration, protecting your privacy.

q2.question: Is my image data secure?
q2.answer: Absolutely secure! All image processing happens in your browser and is not uploaded to our servers. Your image data remains completely local and inaccessible to us.

q3.question: What image formats does ImageCube support?
q3.answer: We support most common image formats including JPG, PNG, WEBP, GIF, SVG, etc. The compression tool also supports smart format conversion, automatically selecting the best output format.

q4.question: How do I report issues or make suggestions?
q4.answer: We welcome your feedback! Please visit our project page via the GitHub icon at the top of the page, where you can submit issues or suggestions.

q5.question: Why choose ImageCube over other tools?
q5.answer: ImageCube advantages: (1) Completely free with no ads (2) Local processing protects privacy (3) Supports batch operations (4) Smart parameter suggestions (5) History records for easy tracking

q6.question: How do ImageCube's AI features work?
q6.answer: Our AI features use advanced machine learning models, with some processing done locally and some using cloud APIs. This protects your privacy while ensuring high-quality results.
